docs.snippet: September has a new box office star in "Hotel Transylvania 2." The PG-rated animated pic earned a robust $47.5 million in its debut weekend, making it the top September opener of all time, according to Rentrak estimates Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: September has a new box office star in "Hotel Transylvania 2." The PG-rated animated pic earned a robust $47.5 million in its debut weekend, making it the top September opener of all time, according to Rentrak estimates Sunday.

headline.main: Clinton on Email Controversy: a 'Drip, Drip, Drip' of Revelations
headline.print_headline: Clinton on Email Controversy: a 'Drip, Drip, Drip' of Revelations

docs.snippet: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said on Sunday the politically damaging "drip, drip, drip" of revelations about her use of a private email server is out of her control and she is unsure when the controversy might end....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said on Sunday the politically damaging "drip, drip, drip" of revelations about her use of a private email server is out of her control and she is unsure when the controversy might end.

headline.main: Report: Negligence Led to Paratrooper's Death During Jump
headline.print_headline: Report: Negligence Led to Paratrooper's Death During Jump

docs.snippet: Negligence by a jump master led to the broken neck and death of a 21-year-old paratrooper from New York who became tangled in another jumper's lines during a 2014 training jump, according to an Army report on the investigation of the death....
docs.lead_paragraph: Negligence by a jump master led to the broken neck and death of a 21-year-old paratrooper from New York who became tangled in another jumper's lines during a 2014 training jump, according to an Army report on the investigation of the death.

headline.main: Putin: U.S. support for Syria rebels illegal
headline.sub: Putin: U.S. support for Syria rebels illegal

docs.snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Sunday branded U.S. support for rebel forces in Syria as illegal and ineffective, saying U.S.-trained rebels were leaving to join Islamic State with weapons supplied by Washington. Rough Cut (no reporter narrati...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Sunday branded U.S. support for rebel forces in Syria as illegal and ineffective, saying U.S.-trained rebels were leaving to join Islamic State with weapons supplied by Washington. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Thongchai Jaidee of Thailand Wins European Open by 1 Shot
headline.print_headline: Thongchai Jaidee of Thailand Wins European Open by 1 Shot

docs.snippet: Thongchai Jaidee of Thailand shot a bogey-free 67 to win the European Open by one shot on Sunday....

headline.main: Raid of Rentboy.com by Homeland Security Stirs Anger
headline.print_headline: Raid of Rentboy.com by Homeland Security Stirs Anger

docs.snippet: Starting with the name, there was never anything discreet about the website Rentboy.com....

headline.main: Cameron Says Syria's Assad Could Stay as Leader in Short Term-Sky
headline.print_headline: Cameron Says Syria's Assad Could Stay as Leader in Short Term-Sky

docs.snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron was quoted by Sky News as saying on Sunday Syrian President Bashar al-Assad could stay on as part of a transitional government but should not be part of Syria's future in the long run....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron was quoted by Sky News as saying on Sunday Syrian President Bashar al-Assad could stay on as part of a transitional government but should not be part of Syria's future in the long run.

headline.main: 'Hotel Transylvania 2' Breaks September Record With $47.5 Million Debut
headline.print_headline: 'Hotel Transylvania 2' Breaks September Record With $47.5 Million Debut

docs.snippet: "Hotel Transylvania 2" easily topped the weekend box office, sinking its teeth into an impressive $47.5 million, and providing a big win for star Adam Sandler and Sony Pictures, the studio behind the animated franchise....
docs.lead_paragraph: "Hotel Transylvania 2" easily topped the weekend box office, sinking its teeth into an impressive $47.5 million, and providing a big win for star Adam Sandler and Sony Pictures, the studio behind the animated franchise.
